about_the_game:
MORTARMEN is a movement based tactical PvP first and third person shooter based in 2030, pitting the New American Coalition versus United Communist Front in a battle for control, as part of an ongoing global space race war.

✪ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ High stakes genre blending arcade and tactical action
✪ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ Chainable movement mechanics: Slide, dodge roll, bunny hop, parachuting, and climbing
✪ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ Velocity based damage, higher the speed, higher the risk
✪ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ Portable mortars with mortar shell cameras
✪ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ Tactical tablet to equip weaponry, view satellite map, and HALO jump to sectors
✪ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ Varied island levels from small to large scale combat
✪ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ Take a gamble and feign your death
✪ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ Stay out of outhouses


All soldiers are able to equip themselves with a portable mortar from their tablet, although skill levels vary, they're easy to use and hard to master. To better aid in target acquisition, cameras are attached to mortar shells until destroyed by impact. Their major role plays into denying sector control and keeping enemies at bay once they're honed in, communication is key to avoid any unforeseen consequences.


Factions battle it out on varied islands, all fighting for control of villages, outposts, and other points of interest in order to gain initiative to bleed the other team dry of reinforcements. Although any sector can be captured at any time, they must be linked to their factions' main base to gain any sector points; this gives opportunities for soldiers to break links of vital sectors to prevent the enemy team from maintaining initiative in the tug of war.



New American Coalition is a combination task force between United States of America and Canada, their core objective is to capture territories across the world where presence of plutonium may have been sighted. Any trace of it will have the NAC calling, in order to further boost their space travel and technological advancements.

United Communist Front is a merged Russian and Chinese alliance, begrudgingly working together to bolster their independent space agencies, they've already destroyed most of the competing satellites in low orbit, with their sights on space stations and beyond, they won't stop until they get a foothold above their adversaries and acquire further plutonium in this newly charged space race.

Join us for Weekly Play Sessions!

Hop in Discord for maximum fun.

content_descriptors.notes: Gun violence in a war themed setting, blood spurts from characters, and ragdoll death physics.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10 (64 bits)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4440 (3.10GHz)/AMD FX-6300 (3.50GHz)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070/AMD Radeon RX Vega 56
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space

  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 2070/AMD Radeon RX 6600 XT

short_description: MORTARMEN is a strategic multiplayer PvP first and third person shooter, pitting the New American Coalition versus United Communist Front in a battle for control of Arakousa, a Mediterranean paradise, where soldiers traverse via sliding, rolling, climbing, and HALO drops.
